unnormalised: Ayurveda treatments are fascinating! I've heard amazing things, especially for de-stressing. Thinking of trying it in Kerala sometime. Anyone recommend a good place? Maybe around Kochi? Heard good reviews about Kottakkal Arya Vaidya Sala. Is it worth the Rs. 5000+ per day price? And can I get good biryani nearby? Maybe even during Onam season for a festive touch!
